label: valueAllowedIndicator
comment: The indication of whether or not the value for this specified parameter is allowed.
The indication of whether or not this control setting parameter value is allowed.
The indication of whether or not this operational parameter value is allowed.
The indication of whether or not this value is allowed for this parameter observation objective.

domainIncludes.comment: A set of measurable factors that specifies the conditions of its operation within a specific context.
A feature that is fixed for the case in question but may be different in other cases for this observation objective.
A set of measurable factors that specifies the conditions within which an entity operates correctly.
A specified feature that is fixed for the case in question but may be different in other cases.
